preview.html: Dreams indicate a girl’s pregnancy via the roy2a.com website. After a woman announces that she is pregnant, she feels very curious to know the gender of her fetus. The article that we will present to you. Dreams indicate pregnancy. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Dreams indicate pregnancy. Vision A pregnant woman with leaves or golden jewelry in a dream announces that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. A deer in a pregnant woman’s dream announces that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman sharing something with her sister in a dream announces that she is pregnant with a girl, and God knows best. Long and soft hair in a pregnant woman’s dream means giving birth to a girl, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream with a pitcher indicates that he will be pregnant soon, and he will become pregnant with a woman, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees roses or flowers in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. Read also: The best answered prayer for pregnancy. Written prayers for pregnancy. Dreams It indicates that the boy is pregnant. Seeing a striped boy in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams of marrying her, this indicates that she has given birth to a male boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman taking a chair from someone and sitting on it in a dream indicates that she is pregnant with a boy, and God knows best. The horse In a pregnant woman’s dream, she announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman with a sword in a dream announces that she will give birth, and God knows best. The moon in a pregnant woman’s dream says that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman and giving birth to children in a dream. Dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins. Seeing a pregnant woman with two pieces. Gold jewelry in a dream indicates that she will give birth to twins, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees her husband reciting Surat Al-Zaruf in a dream, this indicates that she has given birth to twins, and God knows best. I saw a man planting a tree on the road and it was raining, and it indicates that God will bless him with twins, and God knows best. Colorful pigeons In a dream of a pregnant woman, it indicates pregnancy with twins, and God knows best. Fruits that indicate pregnancy in a dream. Seeing a married kiwi in a dream indicates that God will conceive her soon, and God knows best. A dream about peaches for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant. Soon the fetus will be a male with twins, and God knows best. Apples in a married woman’s dream indicate that she will be pregnant soon, and God knows best. Read also: A written prayer for the stability of the pregnancy. The numbers that show pregnancy in a dream. Seeing a married woman as the number zero in a dream. The braid of her pregnancy in the coming period, and God knows best. The number nine. In a married woman’s dream, it also indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman number ten in a dream braid the imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dream of “dreams indicating pregnancy with a girl” through the comments, and the dream team will interpret Your dream, reply and communicate with you.

title: What is the interpretation of a storm in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A storm in a dream. Storms are God’s soldiers on earth, and for people they are a symbol of devastation and devastation. The dream world also has interpretations of seeing a storm in a dream, and they differ depending on the type of storm and the country. About the dreamer and the details of his dream, so learn with us about everything that interests you to see the storm in a dream in the following article. The storm in a dream The interpretation of the dream of the storm in a dream has different meanings, such as: Interpreters indicate that the storm in the dream means the presence of many epidemic diseases in the place, which It harms the dreamer and those around him. Imam Nabulsi also points out that seeing a storm in a dream indicates the presence of many worries and problems that a person faces, and they vary according to the strength of the storm in the dream. It also sometimes indicates the appearance of hunger in its place. The establishment of a fortune teller is the result of extreme poverty. If the dreamer finds a storm with a lot of rain falling in the dream, this is a sign of the presence of many difficulties and obstacles in his life. When one sees that he is flying in a storm and feels fear and panic in the dream, this means that he will travel to a far away place. But he will not make money from it. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google for the online dream interpretation site. The storm in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned different interpretations of the storm in a dream, which are: Among the indications that Ibn Sirin interprets the storm in a dream is the presence of an unjust ruler who wastes It harms people's rights and increases its strength according to the strength of the storm in the dream. If the dreamer sees a strong storm uprooting plants from their place, this means that there will be a disaster in the place and that the plants will decline and the lands will become barren. When the dreamer suddenly sees a storm, this symbolizes that he will lose his job. Soon. If a person dreams of a storm approaching him forcefully, this is an unfavorable sign that he will suffer from an illness that will make him unable to move. If the dreamer sees himself above a large storm and settling in it, this indicates that God will bring him a great kingdom and he will have a high position among men. The Storm In Al-Osaimi’s dream, Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi interprets seeing a storm in a dream as follows: Dreaming of a storm hitting the country and leaving it in ruins indicates that there is a war in the place that could lead to a lot of destruction and loss of life. When the dreamer sees the storm and enjoys it, this is a sign that he He will obtain many material gains and a prosperous existence in his trade. If someone sees a storm at sea, this indicates that problems will arise in his life and he will be exposed to many difficulties in the coming period. If a storm kills someone you know in a dream, this means a great disaster for someone around you. Seeing a storm in the house or moving towards it in a dream indicates that there are crises facing the family at the present time. A storm in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a storm for a single woman: If a girl sees a storm with gusts of air that she breathes in a dream, this is a good sign of good news and an abundance of goodness. For her. When an unmarried woman feels a slight storm, do not...

title: More than 30 interpretations of seeing a dream about the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What do you know about seeing a dream in blue and its interpretation? Dark color is the darkest degree of blue and consists of adding black to blue. The degree of marine color is controlled according to the amount of black added. Marine color has degrees of light and dark, and is considered one of the alternative colors. For black, according to experts. In past fashion and interpretation, will this meaning be reflected in seeing this color in a dream? We learn this in the following words. Blue color in a dream Most scientists - especially psychologists and human development scientists - believe that blue is a comforting color for the eyes, as well as self-love that absorbs a person's negative energy. In the dream, most of the experts’ interpretations came in the sense that her vision is evidence of the psychological comfort and calm in which the dreamer lives. There are other interpretations of this dream in the girl’s dream that may indicate the responsibilities that the dreamer bears, and perhaps if her thought is to collect money and acquire wealth, then the dream may be a sign You get what you get from many. From glaucoma (God willing), and for a pregnant woman, experts explained that seeing this color in her dream is evidence of the ease and comfort of childbirth, and that it will be good for her and her child. Dream interpreters have argued about seeing the color blue in a dream in more than one interpretation that varies according to the viewer and his social status. What is the interpretation of a dream about the color blue for a single woman? The color blue in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the crises she faces, as there are many burdens on her shoulders and this prevents her from moving forward. The interpretation of the appearance of this color suggests that the girl is facing isolation in life or indicates an upcoming journey. To one of the distant countries, after which she will be far from the circle of acquaintances and friends. If a girl sees the color light blue and blue, this indicates that she thinks a lot about money and will have a lot of money. It means fatigue and hardship and this fatigue results in success in work. Seeing the color may be Blue for a single woman is a sign that she will enter a new job. If the girl is wearing dark blue ornate (patterned) clothes, this explains the calm and tranquility that surrounds the viewer’s life of calm and stability and that she is moving in the right direction in her life. If you want a navy blue or blue veil, this indicates As a good, quiet, clean and pure girl. If she sees someone giving her a bouquet of flowers in navy, blue and cyan colors in her dreams, this is interpreted by most scholars as a happy relationship or a close marriage. If she dreams that she wants blue clothes, this will be interpreted as a happy change or a suitable husband. He will propose to her. The color navy blue in a dream for a married woman. The degree of navy color varies in the interpretation of dreams and we will explain it to you in detail in the following article: -For a married woman to see the color blue, it means happiness and abundance of sustenance that will dominate her life in the future. If she sees her husband wearing the color blue This indicates abundant nutrition and material and psychological well-being in a home

title: Interpretation of school in a dream for a married and unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of school in a dream for unmarried and married people by Ibn Sirin. It is the second home in life after the family home. It provides us with outside cultures from the ancient and modern world. Through this we know what a father is and a mother cannot explain to us. It is the home of science, education and moral discipline. It is our beautiful future because it is an encyclopedia of knowledge, skills and creativity with all the experiences and teachers it contains, so in this article I will tell you the interpretation of school in a dream for unmarried and married people according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a school in a dream for a single woman, and here, dear reader, are the most prominent interpretations of seeing school in a dream, where the girl is looking for Meanings indicating the fulfillment of her desires in the near future, as well as repeating the dream of school and seeing friends, and in we refer to this as follows: Seeing a school in a single person’s dream is interpreted with many praiseworthy interpretations. In particular, dream interpreters have indicated that seeing a primary school on Especially in a person’s dream it indicates an urgent marriage at the command of God, and the Lord is the Most High and Most Knowledgeable, the Most Powerful. Seeing a school in a dream indicates the presence of an unmarried girl. Success, excellence, and the momentum that accompanies her career in reality, and God is the Most High. Seeing a school in a dream for a single girl means this. The profits you make are by God’s command in reality. Seeing a school in a dream symbolizes an unmarried girl. Progress in jobs within work, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a study in one’s dream means that God provides for her in her personal and professional life. She will succeed in her work, and in reality she will have a good husband, and only God knows the unseen. Seeing a school for unmarried women in a dream symbolizes. May God bless her marriage. Seeing a school in an unmarried woman’s dream is interpreted as follows: May God grant her a good husband who is characterized by an abundance of knowledge and culture that will make her life better as He desires, and the Lord is the Most High and Most Knowing. The school leads to the marital home that becomes more than ready. To receive the girl there for marriage, God willing. The numerical number also comes from interpretations and interpretations in seeing the school, which indicates the completion of the buying and selling processes. Likewise, the school is based on the goodness and kindness that prevail in the girl’s life in reality. Seeing the school in a dream indicates the presence of an unmarried girl . Achieving the dreams that you have always wanted to achieve on the ground, so God will give them their reward and success, and God alone knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of school for singles: Some girls may think that seeing school often is an unattainable dream, while others believe that it indicates a strong connection. Between this and that, we refer to the interpretations contained in the recurring dream of school for an unmarried woman as follows: The recurring dream of school in a person’s dream is one of the good dreams that portend goodness and happiness, because it carries with it good news in reality, and the Lord knows the unseen. And the recurring dream indicates nostalgia and longing for that. Beautiful days and unforgettable memories cannot be erased from the soul and consciousness

title: Interpretation of a dream about flying with wings according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of flying with wings in a dream by Ibn SirinThe meaning of flying during sleep and arriving at the place that the dreamer wants indicates goodness and life in that place and can express the positive changes that occur in the life of the Creator in an opinion.Interpretation of a dream about flight for a married womanI dreamed of flying, but over the roofs of my house and a house next to me It indicates separation from the partner and marriage to another man who she was with before. A married woman dreams of flying to an unknown place or house. This could threaten her with the approaching term and her death. I saw that I was flying in a dream, but very quickly, a sign that things will change for the better, And I will enjoy a lot of food. A big change in social status and achieving the victory and success that she dreams of in her life and the goals that she pursued for a bright future. I dreamed that my husband threw feathers in the house. Another meaning: that he is close to another woman, or that he is divorcing her. Flying in a dream is magic, indicating changes Which may occur in the dreamer's life such as the freedom, joy and happiness that his heart feels. Opinion wins a lot, in addition to good news about moving to a better place. It expresses a trip to a place where many people dream, perhaps on a pilgrimage or excursion. Interpretation of a dream Flying inside the house. The vision indicates ill health and the dreamer being exposed to illness for a long time. I saw myself returning home. It expresses the strength of the membership and the restrictions that prevent it from achieving the desires and goals it seeks to achieve. The dreamer will face a crisis and many quarrels at home and will fall there in the next few days. The vision expresses About the distress and crises that the mind is exposed to through its home, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of escape and fear. I saw myself flying, but rarely, and I felt anxious and afraid of falling into sins and committing sins, and anxiety and anxiety about revealing and knowing them. I saw a bird in my room and above the bed, and I was very afraid. The vision symbolizes Negligence and sadness arrive, and he must draw closer to the Lord. The dream shows his fear of something that he hides from his family and God shows him his cover. Dream interpretation of stealing and escaping from someone denotes victory over deceivers and enemies in opinion, perhaps on a trip somewhere, and in terms of escape, it indicates Loss of a loved one or the death of the dreamer. Escaping in a dream and stealing is evidence of closeness to God, repentance, and returning to the straight path. Escaping from someone in a dream is evidence of the obsession that pursues him, and his flight to escape what exposed him to injustice. I dreamed that I was running away from someone in a dream and I was afraid It symbolizes escaping from a partner and can be a sign of escaping from evil or evil that is about to fall into. Escaping from a dead person in a dream indicates that we are learning from God’s judgment. I saw a bird in a dream but without wings and feathers. Good visions and a trip for Umrah or Hajj. A sign of disappointment and failure as well as an inability to bear the burdens or responsibility of life. Interpretation of a dream about flying on a carpet of winds. Dream concept: Free girl about freedom.

title: I dreamed that I was wearing 4 golden gouache

preview.html: I dreamed that I was wearing 4 gold gouache in a dream via the roy2a.ocm Vision website. Women wear gold gouache on their hands for decoration and they always strive to buy it in various shapes and sizes, but what is the meaning of seeing gold gouache in a dream, and today through this article we will introduce you to I dreamed that I I was wearing 4 gouache. I went to the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other scholars of dream interpretation, according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant, so follow us. I dreamed that I was wearing golden gouache by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin explained the vision of wearing a golden note in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is living A life of prosperity and luxury. title: Interpretation of a dream about a king visiting the house in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a king visiting the house: The king is one of the important figures, in fact he is the highest, because of his influence, power, and important status. There is no doubt that seeing him in a dream portends that the dreamer will have a high status, and his visit to the house is an indication. In this article, we will point out the different cases in which the dreamer sees a king. Either by visiting him, sitting with him, talking to him, shaking his hand, or kissing his hand, and we present the various references to the senior jurists. And scholars, especially Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of the king visiting the house. The king’s visit to the sick man’s house in a dream may foretell the approaching death of a sick man. Interpretation of the dream of the king visiting the house indicates that the dreamer will advance in his work and assume an important position. Sitting with the king during his visit to the house is a sign of good luck. In this world. King Salman bin Abdulaziz’s visit to a man in his house symbolizes his victory over his enemies and their subversion. Seeing the king visiting a pregnant woman in her dream and congratulating her is a sign of a peaceful birth and receiving the newborn with great joy. He will be the source of their happiness and a just and righteous son. Interpretation of the vision of the king visiting a house Ibn Sirin: In interpreting the dream of the king visiting the house, Ibn Sirin mentioned various connotations, most of which indicate praiseworthy meanings, such as: Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of the king visiting the house in a dream as good news about the abundance of sustenance. Ibn Sirin predicts for the unmarried woman who sees in her dream An angel visits her at home, to soon hear good news, whether academic, professional, or emotional. Seeing a fat king visiting the dreamer in her home in a dream indicates her interest in matters of religion and worship and her desire to perform duties on time. The interpretation of a dream about a king visiting a woman’s home is different. Married women: We find in the sayings of scholars regarding the interpretation of a dream about a king visiting a bachelor’s house promising signs such as: The interpretation of a dream about a king visiting a single house indicates marriage to a rich and important man. If a girl sees an angel visiting her at home, this is news about her high status in the future and the achievement of her goals and aspirations. Seeing the divine An angel visiting her in her home indicates the arrival of goodness and prosperity in her family. When the dreamer sees a non-Arab king visiting her at home in a dream, she will marry a foreigner and travel with him abroad. Interpretation of a dream about a king visiting a married woman’s homeCommentators praise seeing a married angel visiting her in her home, as We see in their interpretations: If a married woman sees a dead person visiting her home, and his appearance is pure, and he wears luxurious clothes, then this is good news for abundant livelihood, and the improvement of living conditions from distress to prosperity and wealth. Seeing the wife of an angel visiting her in her home, honoring her and placing a crown on her head, which indicates that she is a woman. Saleha loves to do good deeds and is distinguished by her good behavior among people. Interpretation of a dream about a king visiting a home for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream an angel visiting her will have confirmation and relieve her of anxiety and stress. We find in the interpretation of her vision promising signs such as: If a pregnant woman sees an angel visiting her house and giving her a crown, then this Evidence that she will give birth to a beautiful female

title: Interpretation of a dream about grains in the hands in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pimples on the hands: Many of us may suffer from acne in our teenage years, and it can be considered an annoying matter, especially for girls, and it can spread to all parts of the body, to the point that most of the places where acne appears are in the face area. . And its appearance is sometimes frightening, and it can distort a person’s vision, so love must be dealt with as soon as it appears before it spreads to many places. Interpretation of a dream about pimples on the hands: There are different types of allergies that a person can suffer from, and they can appear on the hands and feet and can It also has many different signs, while the interpretation of a dream about pimples on the hands is considered one of the dreamer’s signs, which are: It is one of the promising dreams for the dreamer who will enjoy his coming days, and God knows best. It is also a sign of the employee being promoted at work and obtaining a higher position at work. Whereas When a merchant sees that there are digital pills in his hands, this indicates a lot of financial gains and livelihood. It has been stated in the interpretation of commentators that when the pills are in the hands, they are happy and good to the dreamer. While an unmarried girl sees the pills in a dream, it may indicate That is to the good things that await her. While the red pills go to the single woman, they introduce her to a successful romantic relationship. Seeing the pills also indicates an unmarried girl, who is in a relationship with a person who announces that she will marry him soon. Birth control pills for a married woman are also signs of pregnancy Soon, and this is one of the happy people for her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing potatoes in a dream from the most famous scholars. Complete interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about hand allergy for a single woman. Often times she can develop an allergy as a result of eating a food or medicine and the body does not respond to it, or it reacts with another medicine And food while the body does not respond to it. Interpretation of a dream about hand sensitivity for a single woman, can bring these interpretations to God: It may be considered a sign of happiness and goodness that she will enjoy in her next life, and God knows best. He is also dying for the good news that she will hear soon. He is also dying Of the people who fulfill their dreams and wishes for the single girl who was always waiting for her. Likewise, people should marry whomever their heart desires. Some commentators interpreted that a girl suffering from any skin disease indicates the problems that await her, and God knows best. It is one of the signs of the many positive changes that will occur in her life. The single woman. Ibn Sirin explained that allergies in general are one of the human symptoms that he transmits to the dreamer in his dreams. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing baldness in a dream from the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a skin disease on the face. There are many of us who can suffer from many skin diseases that can To affect its shape and when a dream about a skin disease on the face can come with many different interpretations of the fortuneteller, from which it came: It can be considered a good sign for a girl when she has a skin disease, and from

title: Interpretation of a dream: My husband Ali got married and his wife is pregnant

preview.html: Today’s vision is one of those dreams whose interpretation we will learn through this article, so follow us to learn the interpretation of the dream of my husband who married Ali and I am pregnant. The interpretation of seeing my husband marry Ali and his wife pregnant in a single girl’s dream. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying a married man, this is a sign. However, she is approaching her marriage to a person who does not suit her or suit her. She will regret this marriage later. In the event that an unmarried woman becomes engaged and sees her fiancé in a dream marrying another woman. In reality, she is afraid of separating from him and always feels that this person is not loyal to her. Seeing marriage in general in a single person’s dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, high status, and success in study and work. Whoever marries her father in a dream will receive great care and love from her father. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a woman getting married in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing my husband marrying Ali and his wife while she is pregnant. A dream about a married woman: Imam Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees in her dream it is as if her husband has married another woman and his new wife is pregnant. The dream promises her an increase in goodness and money in her home and an expansion in the scope of her husband’s livelihood. One of the contemporary interpreters of dreams says that when a married woman sees in her dream, the matter is similar to a marriage Her marriage to her and the birth of his new wife.. The dream assures her that her husband will not marry her for the rest of his life. Psychologists say that these dreams appear as a result of the dreamer’s recurring thoughts about her husband and her preoccupation with the smallest details of him. Which always makes her feel anxious and doubtful that he will marry her or meet another woman. Interpretation Seeing my wife marrying another man in a dream about the man and its meaning When a man dreams that his wife is marrying another man. It is a sign that he will lose his job and may lose some of his money if he is a merchant. The dream also expresses the loss of something dear to the dreamer’s heart. In case he sees the husband in his dream That his wife is married to someone else. The features of this person did not appear in the dream, so it is a sign of the death of his wife. If this person is known to the viewer, cooperation or benefit can be achieved between them. If a man dreams that he is going to marry his ex-girlfriend, then he feels lonely and misses his old memories. It is He married a virgin in a dream, so he may have good and wonderful food, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about attending a wedding in a dream. The meaning of seeing my husband marry Ali and his wife while she is pregnant in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman dreams of her marrying her husband and carrying his new wife. The dream promises her good news that God Almighty He will give her a beautiful wife. Her husband’s livelihood will expand and the house will be good. This vision also indicates that the husband will be promoted at work and may receive a financial bonus. The dream also represents the dreamer who travels abroad to work and earn money and it will be a successful trip, God willing. As for the opinion of psychologists on This dream is that the psychological pressures and a lot of pressure in the dreamer’s life. They made her imagine things she sees in her dreams that do not mean anything. They are just dreams, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing my wife marrying another man in a dream for young men and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing my wife marrying another man in a dream for young people and its meaning.

title: Interpretation of a tower in a dream: Climbing towers in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a high tower, a building collapsing, a tall tower falling. If you see a tower in a dream, its interpretation is that you aspire to reach the highest positions. If you climb a tower, you will succeed in achieving your desires, but if the tower collapses inside you as you descend from it, this means that you will fail in achieving your dreams. If one dreams that he is in a tower, he will not be safe from those who are searching for him, even if he is sick, and dying. (And whoever sees) that he is on a wall, tower, or wall, this will win a man in great danger. (And whoever dreams) that he is in a tower There is no good in him, for this is his grave, and it does not harm him to see himself in it or in it. Towers and tall buildings in a dream Towers are an architectural phenomenon that characterizes the modern city and in reality reflects the progress and prosperity of this city. Towers are spreading rapidly in our Arab world, especially in the Gulf region. The most famous of these buildings is the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, as well as the Kingdom Tower in Riyadh, as well as the Cairo Tower in Egypt. The towers and tall buildings in the dream express the dreamer’s ambition and long-term goals. Entering these buildings and trying to reach the highest floor is an expression in the dream of the dreamer’s attachment to success. Towers and high-rise buildings in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees that she is climbing a high floor in a tall building such as a tower, this is a good interpretation, because climbing in this context expresses movement in the future direction. The girl can deduce the meaning of the dream through the floor number or number. Because it can express the time or number of years remaining to achieve the dream and the best numbers in the dream are even ones, as they often express good. A girl who sees in her dream that she is climbing a tall building should stop at the signal of people who may stand in her way and these friends or Relatives or loved ones are a happy beautiful girl in the future. If an unmarried woman sees that she has ascended to a high-rise building with an elevator and in the meantime finds a handsome or smiling young man, this is interpreted as good luck in addition to the beauty and beauty of this young man. If an unmarried woman sees that she has ascended All floors of this building or tower until you reach the highest floor and start seeing the city from above, this is its interpretation. To achieve all her goals or desires, and it is good for the girl to wake up from her sleep in this scene, because such dreams sometimes have clear and realistic connotations. The tower, architecture, and high-rise building in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees that she lives in a tower, building, or high-rise building, then This interpretation is good and indicates positive changes, either socially or economically, because a tall building or building represents height, especially if the building is luxurious. Or its design is unique, amazing, or wonderful. A tall or tall tower in a married woman’s dream may express her ambition or her future in general. It is better for the building to be completed and there are no defects in it, as she hates leaning towers in the interpretation because they represent bad luck. The woman standing in front of A tall tower and contemplating it expresses a decisive pause or a dividing stage between the past and the future
